title: A Wife for Isaac
summary: Genesis 24 describes how Abrahamâ€™s servant is sent to find a wife for Isaac. God leads him to Rebekah, who agrees to marry Isaac. The chapter emphasizes faith, guidance, and God's providence.

faq.question: How did the servant know Rebekah was the one?
faq.answer: She fulfilled the exact prayer he had made to God by offering water to him and his camels.

faq.question: How did Rebekah respond to the proposal?
faq.answer: She agreed to go immediately and marry Isaac, showing trust and courage.
